data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 14457, Version Hash: 3b2bbc09cb6eff6066e846f118bb93dce41fdbd8
data.actual_result: My voice is clear but game's sound for my friends is choppy.
data.expected_result: My voice and game's sound should be clear and nice.
data.short_description: Streaming game with sound of it and plugged in headphones makes game's sound for my friends really bad.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a friend to make this bug. - Connect to a DM voice channel. - One person should have headphones plugged in. - Same person should stream a game (with sound of it!). - Second person should hear choppiness instead of clear game's sound but for first person sound from game is fine because this person is not hearing it from stream. - (When I was testing it with friends all of us also have microphone plugged in.)
